short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is being used to read the DirectoryDevice ID and autolaunch Hotel MSSNGR Digital Signage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an internal extension to help us migrate from Chrome Box Kiosk Apps to PWA. Chrome Kiosk Apps will be deprecated in June 22 which means that we need to find a new way to identify our Kiosk Boxes via the Enterprise Directory ID.
This App is not to be distributed to Web Store users!
